thread.title: Nice little hotel tres "sympa", convenient location for south of Paris.
thread.title_full: Nice little hotel tres "sympa", convenient location for south of Paris. - Review of Hotel Henriette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mike-OWaterloo
title: Nice little hotel tres "sympa", convenient location for south of Paris.
text:
Stayed here for 5 nights in December 2016. This little hotel is on a quiet side street very close to the Gobelins metro. The small rooms (although size is consistent with Paris standards) are done in a slightly chic/eclectic/retro style. (Not always a great thing : the 60s era desk chair needed the provided cushion: without it, very uncomfortable.) Clean. Wifi was good. Breakfast was the usual Euro/continental selection with nice croissants, brioche, breads, plus ham and cheese.
Location is close to the well-known Rue Mouffetard which has a lot of little shops and restaurants. From there you can continue to the Pantheon in the 5ieme.
